title: Time of Taking Sahoor - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: sahur is the pre- dawn meal it can be taken any time from Midnight up to just before the break of dawn and as the Quran says which I mentioned earlier in Surah bakar chapter number two verse number 187 eat and drink until the white thread of dawn appears to you distinct from the black thread so you can have the sord any time from Midnight up to the break of down but according to the sun of the prophet it is preferable to delay the S as late as possible and just before the break of dawn that is preferable and there are various Hadith mentioning about that there's a Hadith which is mentioned in Hadith number 9057 where a man tells Abbas pleas with him that he had the till he doubted it was the break of down the moment he had a doubt it was break of down he stopped so Abbas with him he said that keep on having the meal until your doubt is clarified that the dawn has broken it's mentioned in say bukari Vol number three in the book of fasting Hadith number 1921 z babit may Allah pleas with him he said that after he had SW with the prophet he went for Salah the time difference between theur and the Adan is equal to the time required to recite 50 verses of the Quran
